tweets.text:
How each political party has responded to this national, student-led school walkout speaks volumes: 

Democrats have joined students in the streets, hand-in-hand across America to support action to stop gun violence. 

Republicans have taken to Twitter to mock the students.

One day after a dog died in an overhead bin and Republicans demand regulation that'll prevent it from happening again.
